Text: anyone get this to work yet?
Fast download, didnt get a virus warning (but it isnt updated so dont take my word that its clean) so far working perfectly!

It's working :D

I am actually playing it and it's good.
The installer does not finish installing the game is just freezes at the end...

I seem to be having some trouble running the game, when i go to install the installation freezes right when the loading bar is full. However, i am still able to open the game after I close out the (apparently) partially completed installer. Everything runs smooth until the actual game play where all the textures, giants and landscape are unrecognizable due to a glitchyness....

im thinking a corrupt installation, but it could just be my rig...im running windows 7 by the way.

I have tried reinstalling 3 times, and always same results, any suggestions?
thanks for the upload Anon...very timely for an indie game released today

hey sillo441,  it froze for me at the end too, but randomly i clicked on the icon it made on my desktop to launch the game and it launched and the installer finished, i alt tabed and clicked finish and it was good to go.  weird, i know..

Killing78

Have you tried installing different drivers for your video card, use admin rights for the game and install it in a different folder than the typical program files/x86?
The installer appears to freeze at the end, but just wait it out and it's fine.
If installer is freezing, just wait a minute, and it will end. Maybe someone uploaded this as Anonymous, because he don't eventually need problems, or he's scared ? xD
i added both patches today to TBP
